definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: (two camps)—E. of Jordan; name from Jacob's meeting angels acc. to Ge 32:3 (J), place on border of Gad Jos 13:26, of Manasseh v:Jos 13:30 (P); Levit. city in Gad Jos 21:36 (P) = 1Ch 6:65; named also 2Sa 2:8 ([[מַחֲנׇ֑יִם]]), v:2Sa 2:12, v:2Sa 2:29 ([[נׇ֑יִם]]-), 2Sa 19:33, 1Ki 2:8 ([[נׇ֑ים]]-); [[מַחֲנׇ֑יְמָה]] 2Sa 17:24, 2Sa 17:27, 1Ki 4:14; site unknown, v. Di:Gn; [[כִּמְחׂלַת הַמַּחֲנׇ֑יִם]] Ct So 7:1 is put here by Ew Hi Öt al.: as at a (the) dance of Mahanaim; dance of a double choir Gi Stickel RV.
